sourcesContent: import { useState } from 'react' import { Container, ImgDiv, InfoContainer, SongName, AuthorName, IconContainer, FontAwesome, Track, AnimateTrack } from './MusicPlayerSmallElements.js' import { faSlidersH, faPlay } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' const MusicPlayerSmall = () => { const [animationPercentage, setAnimationPercentage] = useState(50) return ( <> 甘蔗 夜貓組 ) } export default MusicPlayerSmall
